actions.instructions:
# Add Image to Album

You can request to add an image to one of the albums that the bot uses. The bot will add all images in a post and/or in quoted posts to the image review queue. If the person running the bot approves an image, it will be added to the album.
actions.name: Add Image to Album

actions.instructions:
# Death Toll

zeroCool can tell you all about coronavirus. This handy action scrapes the CDC.gov website and posts the current U.S. Coronavirus Death Toll. It also posts the total number of coronavirus cases.
actions.name: Death Toll

actions.instructions:
# Closer

Zooms in on image, uploads it to imgur, and posts the zoomed in image.
actions.name: Zoom in on Image

actions.instructions:
# Get Image From Album

You can request a random image from one of the albums that the bot uses. The bot will quote your post and post one of the images from the requested album.
actions.name: Get Image From Album

actions.instructions:
# Redder

Raises the red levels of an image, hosts it on imgur, and posts it.
actions.name: Redden image

actions.instructions:
# Wider

Widens an image, hosts it on imgur, and posts it.
actions.name: Widen Image

general:
# How to use zeroCool, an SA Forums Bot

zeroCool reads and responds to posts on SA automatically. Here is a list of the responses that it can make. To use the bot, just post in a thread that the bot is reading. If your post matches one of the action triggers, then the bot will respond to your post.
